regex.name: LoginAndCookies
regex.agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; WOW64; rv:46.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/46.0

regex.name: get=URL
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import requests, re def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = 'http://www.layarku.tv/media/ntv7sec.php?url=http://www.layarku.tv/media2/tvmysec.m3u8 '): headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0','Referer': 'http://www.layarku.tv/media/ntv7m.php'} source = requests.get(url, headers=headers) m3u8 = re.findall('BANDWIDTH=[\d\D]*\n.*?([^\"]+)', source.text)[0] return m3u8 + '|headers'

regex.name: get=URL
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import requests, re def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = 'http://www.layarku.tv/media/tv9sec.php?url=http://www.layarku.tv/media2/tvmysec.m3u8 '): headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0','Referer': 'http://www.layarku.tv/media/tv9m.php'} source = requests.get(url, headers=headers) m3u8 = re.findall('BANDWIDTH=[\d\D]*\n.*?([^\"]+)', source.text)[0] return m3u8 + '|headers'

regex.name: get=URL
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import requests, re def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = 'http://www.layarku.tv/media/8tvsec.php?url=http://www.layarku.tv/media2/tvmysec.m3u8 '): headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0','Referer': 'http://www.layarku.tv/media/member8tv.php'} source = requests.get(url, headers=headers) m3u8 = re.findall('BANDWIDTH=[\d\D]*\n.*?([^\"]+)', source.text)[0] return m3u8 + '|headers'
